miniBioContent: Blockchain educator and developer focused on Ethereum, smart contracts and Bitcoin. MSc in digital currencies. She has been working with technology for over 20 years. Speaker in world conferences since 2018, also she won awards at Ethereum hackathons. Co-founder ETHSamba.  She was listed in Cointelegraph Brazil top 50 and top 2 women.
